police in winnipeg said thursday they do not know what triggered a vicious attack on a greyhound bus the night before that led to the beheading of a passenger witnesses say a man was stabbed to death and then decapitated in what appears to be a random act of violence on board the bus that was en route to winnipeg late wednesday
